content: The secret key will be deleted permanently. You will not be able to undo this action.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a confirmation message when deleting a secret key. It informs users that the action will be permanent and irreversible, typically found in a delete button or modal dialog in UI components.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'gizli' (secret) is technically correct, but 'xüsusi açar' (special key) might be more natural in this context. While 'gizli' is understandable, 'xüsusi' conveys a stronger sense of privacy and importance, aligning better with the 'secret key' terminology.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xüsusi açar həmişəlik silinəcək. Bu əməliyyatı geri qaytara bilməzsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'シークレットキー' (si-ku-retto-ki) is a transliteration of 'secret key' and while understandable, '秘密鍵' (himitsu-ken) is a more natural and commonly used Japanese term for 'secret key' in a technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'シークレットキー' with '秘密鍵' (himitsu-ken).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: There is an unnecessary space in the Lao translation before 'ໄດ້'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄີທີ່ລັບຈະຖືກລົບອອກຢ່າງຖາວອນ ທ່ານຈະບໍ່ສາມາດຍົກເລີກການກະທຳນີ້ໄດ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks a conjunction between the two sentences, making it slightly abrupt. While grammatically correct, it reads better with a conjunction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sekretny klucz zostanie trwale usunięty. Nie będziesz w stanie cofnąć tego działania.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation ends abruptly with an ellipsis (...) instead of a full stop. This makes the sentence feel incomplete and unnatural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A chave secreta será eliminada permanentemente. Não poderá anular esta ação.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "anular" isn't incorrect, "reverter" or "desfazer" would be more common and natural translations for 'undo' in this context, especially when referring to a deletion action.  'Anular' implies more of a cancellation or invalidation, rather than a reversal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A chave secreta será eliminada permanentemente. Não poderá reverter esta ação.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ће' is technically correct but sounds somewhat dated in contemporary Serbian. A more natural phrasing would be 'биће'.

The Serbian translation 'Ova radnja se ne može opozvati' while technically correct, is less natural and slightly more formal than a more direct equivalent. A more natural phrasing would more closely reflect the English 'You will not be able to undo this action'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tajni ključ ne može biti vraćen nakon obrisan.
